Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Enemy Class

    This class is a sprite fot the enemies. It contains the position variales of the enemies provides of painting and moving the enemies and for collision detecion.

    Instance Variables:

    x: x coordinate of the enemy

    y: y coordinate of the enemy

    speedX: horizontal displacement of the enemy

    mainImage: main image that is currently shown

    goingRight: image when ship is going right

    goingLeft: image when ship if going left

    height: height of the enemy ship

    weight: weight of the enemy ship

    Author:
    Utkarsh Lamba

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int speed)
        Constructor public Enemy()

        This constructor sets the initial variables of the enemy ship, loads the images. It also strats off the ship in randomly either the right or the left direction and sets the images accordingly..

        This method moves the ship across and down the ocean and changes direction when the ship hits the boundaries.

        Parameters:
